instant.description: Skip the endless swiping. Our priority matching puts you in front of compatible profiles instantly.

vip.description: Diamond members enjoy concierge service, priority support, and exclusive perks.

howItWorks.label: Simple Process
howItWorks.title: Your Journey to
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to finding your perfect international connection.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up and craft your unique profile. Add photos, interests, and what you're looking for in a connection.

step2.title: Discover Matches
step2.description: Our AI algorithm analyzes your preferences and presents you with highly compatible matches worldwide.

step3.title: Start Conversations
step3.description: Break the ice with our intelligent conversation starters. Language barriers? Our AI handles translation instantly.

step4.title: Build Connections
step4.description: Take your conversations deeper. Plan virtual dates, join exclusive events, and nurture meaningful relationships.
